Package: uniandes.unacloud.web.services

[Groovy] Class ImageService

    • uniandes.unacloud.web.services.ImageService

    • This service contains all methods to manage User Image: Crud methods, some methods send tasks in queue This class connects with database using hibernate

      Authors:
      CesarF

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          java.lang.Object alterImagePrivacy(java.lang.Object toPublic, Image image)
          Alters image privacy from public to private (delete public file in imageTemplates folder) or private to public (create public file in imageTemplates folder).
          java.lang.Object clearCache(Image image)
          Sends a task to remove image from cache in all physical machines
          java.lang.Object deleteImage(User user, Image image)
          Deletes the image, image files and directory if image have a main file creates a task to delete from repository, in another case deletes image
          java.lang.Object getAvailablePublicImages()
          Returns all available public images
          java.lang.Object getListMachinesByPlatform(Platform plat)
          Returns list of images which have linked
          java.lang.Object newPublic(java.lang.Object name, java.lang.Object imageId, User user)
          Creates a new image from on a public one
          java.lang.Object removeUnavailableImages(User user)
          Searches all unavailable images from user, remove images not loaded and changes to available those with current file
          java.lang.Object setValues(Image image, java.lang.Object name, java.lang.Object user, java.lang.Object password, java.lang.Object operatingSystemId, java.lang.Object platformId)
          Sets new values for the image
          java.lang.Object updateFiles(Image image)
          creates a token to be used to upload image in file manager project
          java.lang.Object uploadImage(java.lang.Object name, java.lang.Object isPublic, java.lang.Object accessProtocol, java.lang.Object operatingSystemId, java.lang.Object platformId, java.lang.Object username, java.lang.Object password, User user)
          creates a new image with an unique token

      • Method Detail

        • java.lang.Object alterImagePrivacy(java.lang.Object toPublic, Image image)

          Alters image privacy from public to private (delete public file in imageTemplates folder) or private to public (create public file in imageTemplates folder).

          Parameters:
          toPublic
          image
          user

        • java.lang.Object clearCache(Image image)

          Sends a task to remove image from cache in all physical machines

          Parameters:
          image

        • java.lang.Object deleteImage(User user, Image image)

          Deletes the image, image files and directory if image have a main file creates a task to delete from repository, in another case deletes image

          Parameters:
          user - owner user
          repository - image repository
          image - image to be removed
          Returns:
          true in case image has been deleted, false in case not

        • java.lang.Object getAvailablePublicImages()

          Returns all available public images

          Returns:
          list of available public images

        • java.lang.Object getListMachinesByPlatform(Platform plat)

          Returns list of images which have linked

          Parameters:
          plat
          Returns:
          void

        • java.lang.Object newPublic(java.lang.Object name, java.lang.Object imageId, User user)

          Creates a new image from on a public one

          Parameters:
          name - image name
          publicImage - public image used as template
          user - owner user
          Returns:
          true in case task has been send, false in case not

        • java.lang.Object removeUnavailableImages(User user)

          Searches all unavailable images from user, remove images not loaded and changes to available those with current file

          Parameters:
          user
          Returns:
          void

        • java.lang.Object setValues(Image image, java.lang.Object name, java.lang.Object user, java.lang.Object password, java.lang.Object operatingSystemId, java.lang.Object platformId)

          Sets new values for the image

          Parameters:
          image - image to be edited
          name - new image name
          user - new belonging user
          password - new image password
          operatingSystemId - new operating system
          platformId - new platform

        • java.lang.Object updateFiles(Image image)

          creates a token to be used to upload image in file manager project

          Parameters:
          i - image to be edited
          files - new set of files
          user - owner user
          Returns:
          token to validates image

        • java.lang.Object uploadImage(java.lang.Object name, java.lang.Object isPublic, java.lang.Object accessProtocol, java.lang.Object operatingSystemId, java.lang.Object platformId, java.lang.Object username, java.lang.Object password, User user)

          creates a new image with an unique token

          Parameters:
          diskSize - image disk size
          name - image name
          isPublic - indicates if the image will be uploaded as a public image
          accessProtocol - indicates the access protocol configured in the image
          operatingSystemId - image OS
          username - image access user
          password - image access password
          user - owner user
          Returns:
          token to validate image
